items.question: What bill formats are supported?
items.answer: Our bot supports bills from Splash, NIC old, and NIC new formats. You can send weekly or monthly bill/balance updates to your customers.

items.question: How much do SMS messages cost?
items.answer: SMS messages are charged at ‚Çπ0.20 per message. This is billed separately from your subscription plan. Telegram messages are completely free.

items.question: What happens after my subscription ends?
items.answer: After your subscription term ends, you have the option to self-host the bot on your local machine without any additional charges. The same options apply as our one-time purchase plan.

items.question: What kind of support is included?
items.answer: The annual and 3-year plans include support with responses within 24 hours. The one-time purchase plan includes support with responses within 7 days. All plans include free updates during their respective terms.

items.question: How does the Telegram bot work?
items.answer: Our Telegram bot connects to your business systems and allows you to send bills, messages, and manage users directly through the Telegram interface.

items.question: Do customers need to have Telegram to receive bills?
items.answer: No, customers without Telegram can receive bills via SMS. SMS messages are charged separately at ‚Çπ0.20 per message sent.

items.question: Can I send promotional messages to my customers?
items.answer: Yes, you can send advertisements and promotional messages to all users or target specific customer segments. (only on Telegram)

items.question: How do I add users with different roles?
items.answer: Through the admin panel, you can add users and assign them specific roles with customized permissions based on their responsibilities.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply click the 'Get Started' button, choose your subscription plan, and follow our setup guide to connect the bot to your Telegram account.

items.question: How are SMS charges billed?
items.answer: SMS charges are not included in the subscription price. They are billed separately at ‚Çπ0.20 per SMS sent, you can purchase 1,000 to 5,00,000 at once. (1 SMS = 153 English characters, including spaces)
